text: I can't take this anymore — this semester is crushing me.
I feel like giving up because I'm failing my classes.
I'm terrified about my presentation and I feel like everyone will laugh at me.
I don't know what to do anymore about my exams — I'm overwhelmed.
I feel hopeless about my thesis progress, but I don't want to hurt myself.
I feel like I'm breaking down from all these deadlines.
I keep making mistakes in class and I'm scared people will judge me.

I don't know… I just feel like I'm going to fail the final.

I feel like I can't breathe when I think about the exam.
I'm so stressed I feel physically sick, but it's because of school.
I feel like everything is pointless when I look at my grades.

I feel like people will laugh at my face if I answer wrong in class.

I'm overwhelmed by my coursework and I don't know where to start.

I feel overwhelmed, but I am not suicidal.
